name: Super Sec Soccer
description:
Finally you can play soccer with your buddy without having to explain what the hell the offside rule is about, or what the difference is between a penalty or a freekick.

Super Sec (from the French word meaning stripped down/without excess) Soccer clears soccer of all those bothersome rules so all you're left with is fast, and sometimes hectic, local multiplayer fun. All you have to do is score more goals than the other guy before the 90 second timer runs out.

Features:
  • up to 4 players
  • keyboard and gamepad support (2 gamepads are recommended)
  • vs human mode
  • vs AI mode
This game does NOT feature:
  • offside
  • hands
  • throw-ins
  • corners
  • free kicks
  • penalty's
  • half time
  • switching sides
  • fouls
  • a referee
  • assistant refs
  • diving
  • ball out of play
  • a kick-off
  • 22 players
  • boring super defensive matches
Greenlight

Vote for Super Sec Soccer on Steam Greenlight.

Steam codes will be available for everyone who purchased the game via itch.io

9 second demo (windows)

You can download the 9 second demo to see what it's all about. There are some limitations however, but maybe you're into that kind of stuff:

  • no vs human mode
  • matches only last 9 seconds
  • no sudden death on a tie
  • just grass
